head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHWARTZ, HUGH L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHWARTZ, HUGH L.

block.p: SCHWARTZ-Hugh L. Died Friday, May 26, age 70, of San Francisco. Founder and president of Hugh Schwartz Associates and Public Response Associates. Beloved husband of Judy Askew and the late Geraldine Lynch Schwartz. Loving father of Annie and David Esposito of Alameda, Calif., Justin of Berkeley, Calif., Meghan Schwartz and Robert Hinkle of Cairo, Jeremy of Chicago, and Benjamin of London. Brother of Peter of Brooklyn. Memorial service Friday, June 2, at 1:00 PM, Swedenborgian Church, 2107 Lyon Street, San Francisco.
